Note: Any bugs, crashes and problems won't be fixed for this version.
cheatForge: This version of Forge contains a bug that provides an unfair advantage for PvP.
To prevent false bans and cheat occusations, you won't be able to join using this version.
This bug affects Minecraft Forge for %versions%.
Please, use another mod loader (e.g. Fabric or Quilt), another Minecraft version, or the vanilla (unmodified) client.
If you still want to use Forge, download and install this mod: %mod%
